author: seamonkey82
content:
I migrated all of my kiln testing to a new machine and after building the latest versions of the clients and attempting to run, all of my nethermind instances were claiming db corruption, so I cleared them and started sync from scratch.  Now they're all returning
```
:{"code":-32601,"message":"Method engine_newPayloadV1 is not supported"}
```

author: hoshimgg
content: Are you using geth? This happened to me on ETH1 as well.

author: marekm3498
content:
Do you have logs maybe? Please DM me if you have them. We fixed one issue on restarts recently. This error message means that you don't have Merge.Plugin.dll in your plugins folder 

git clone --recursive -b kiln https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind.git
cd nethermind/src/Nethermind
dotnet build Nethermind.sln -c Release
cd Nethermind.Runner
dotnet run -c Release -- --config kiln --JsonRpc.Host=0.0.0.0 --JsonRpc.JwtSecretFile=/tmp/jwtsecret

with these steps (don't use no-build) you should have Merge.Plugin in your plugins folder

author: seamonkey82
content: I was still carrying over `--no-build` on all instances from my previous machine.  That fixed it.  Thank you!
